column5:
I'm proud to be a Featured Contributor to @thinkHDI again and share my first article of 2022!

This one is all about making problem ownership a #team effort. #CX #EX #IT #ITSM #ESM #CustomerService

Many companies react to customer #feedback when it begins to cause their executives pain. They're often sheltered from harsh #CX realities by well-meaning middle #management. After pulling back the curtain, they're often are inspired to take action. #CCTR

Icebreaker | #ICMIchat

What is one thing you learned or reconsidered because of #ICMIchat discussions?
@scott_saas @CustomerIsFirst Great way to look at it, Scott! Welcome back!
@sherikendall @ICMIchat @EricaMarois @RoyAtkinson I agree, Sheri! It has made a world of difference to me. It's been my honor to host for the past year. #ICMIchat
@OfficiumLabs Hi, Sydney! Welcome back! Always a pleasure to have you in #ICMIchat!
@jtwatkin Howdy, Jeremy! Great #CXQOTD today! Welcome back to #ICMIchat!
@CustomerIsFirst I am too, so happy you made it to #ICMIchat!
Welcome to this special (and sad) #ICMIchat, where we're sharing final thoughts before the retirement of this event. Let's discus some big ideas to keep us moving forward!

Howdy, #ICMIchat! I'm so happy you're here for a big send-off! Who's joining me?

Today we're talking: "Final Thoughts: Big Ideas for Moving Forward"
@JeremyHyde_ I believe the Twitterverse is fueled primarily by objections... so I'll allow it. :) #ICMIchat

@justinmrobbins It has been an honor to be a part of this amazing #ContactCenter community. I'm very thankful for the amazing friendships I've made through #ICMIchat, too. Thank you for being a part of it with me!
@esmancuso I can't wait to see you there, Erica! #ICMIchat
@toister @CallCenterICMI Hi, Jeff! This is my last week with @CallCenterICMI, and we made a decision to retire #ICMIchat with my departure. It will be deeply missed!
Our last #ICMIchat is coming up, I hope you'll join me for a strong send-off!

In @jtwatkin's case, I might wait a little while after a number port-out is complete. This may help detect long-term issues following a port, such as 'dirty' numbers that are prone to misdials and robocalls.

#CXQOTD | Jan 7

Survey customers after you've served them! You'd be surprised how many send #surveys too early. Bottom-box scores are guaranteed.

Bonus points: if your survey can detect and notify management of unresolved issues and inadvertent case closure. #CX #CCTR #VOC
@LeslieO @CallCenterICMI I'll "hop on a call" with you any time! ðŸ¤£
@JeremyHyde_ @AlHopper_ @NealTopf @CallCenterICMI They're keeping an open mind, and when the time is right you may see a return!
So, yes. Omnichannel is a realistic goal. You won't be everywhere, but you can be where customers need you. You can't just buy that capability, though.

#CXQOTD | Jan 5

The key to #Omnichannel #CustomerService is to stop thinking about #channels and start thinking about #service.

There cannot be any disparity in your policy, procedures, knowledge, or training between channels. It's not a #technology problem. #CX #CCTR

With my resignation from @CallCenterICMI, I'm sad to say that #ICMIchat will be retiring after next week. I hope that you'll mark your calendar and join me for a final look at the best #ContactCenter and #CX advice on Twitter. Check out the questions: https://t.co/ohJkDxmdvZ https://t.co/6bdZYMJ1oT
@SueDuris @CallCenterICMI I hope to see you in next week's #ICMIchat, Sue!

@JeremyHyde_ @AlHopper_ @NealTopf @CallCenterICMI Hi @NealTopf, @AlHopper_, & @JeremyHyde_! It was a difficult decision to retire #ICMIchat, but with my departure at the end of next week it was the right time. We have other great virtual events in the works for the year ahead, though!

@esmancuso @CallCenterICMI Hi, Erica! I've missed you in #ICMIchat for sure! It's truly a great way to meet others passionate about #CX and #CCTR. We have other great virtual events in the works, though.

@JeremyHyde_ @LeslieO @CallCenterICMI Hi, Jeremy! I am also disappointed, but the time has come for #ICMIchat to retire. I will miss the community and all those who participated, but we also have exciting virtual events planned this year, too!

@LeslieO @CallCenterICMI Hi, Leslie! I'll be leaving @CallCenterICMI at the end of next week, and regrettably #ICMIchat isn't sustainable with our current staffing levels. I will miss the community and all those who participated, but we also have exciting virtual events on the horizon, too!
@LeslieO @Cabelas Also, why is ladies plural? Do they only sell sets of 2+?
